questionsData.title: To crossbreed animals, they must be of the same family.
A stream is smaller than a river.
A wasp sting is acidic .
Cackling means making noise .
The word grazing means chewing the cud .
An epidemic is a shortage of food .
The source of sound is vibration.
Light is the effect of something vibrating.
Vaccination is giving a weak form of a disease to spread a disease.
questionsData.explain_answer:
Vaccination is giving a weak form of a disease  to prevent  a disease.

Vaccines work by exposing your body to a weakened or inactive form of a virus or bacteria. This triggers your immune system to develop antibodies that can fight off the real disease if you encounter it later. 

diseases are spread by germs.and vaccination using a very weak form of the disease could lead to immunity.

questionsData.title: A group of letters that goes in front of a word is a prefix .
Acids turn the litmus paper into green.
There is no sound in the outer space .
In liquids, the particles are not fixed.
Changing the color of peas means stuffing .
Synonyms are words with the opposite meaning .
Al-Khwarizmi proved that diseases are spread by germs.
questionsData.explain_answer:
Dr Louis Pasteur. He developed Jenner’s work and showed that

diseases are spread by germs.

questionsData.title: Convex lenses can make objects look larger.
We see things by refraction.
Something that puts you ahead of other people is an advantage .
To watch carefully is to observe .
How long did it take the horses to be ill ?
questionsData.article: In September 1994, a violent disease erupted among a group of race horses in a small town in Australia. The first victim was a female horse that was last seen eating grass beneath a fruit tree. One of her caretakers brought the animal back to her stable for observation, but the horse died two days later. Within two weeks, most of the other horses in the stable become ill as well. Despite the efforts by the veterinarian, 12more animals died. Laboratory analysis finally discovered the root of the problem: the horses had been infected by a previously unknown virus which doctors eventually labeled Hendra. This virus had originated in bats that lived in the tree where the first horse had been eating grass. The virus passed from the bats to the horse, which then transmitted the virus to other horses with disastrous results.

questionsData.title: We add ….. to change the word "polite" into negative .
Get your children ….. hard for the exam.
I smelt something ……
I am …… to Canada next year .
Doctor Wang died last year ….. he got cancer .
The adjective of the word " happily " is …..
I …… the internet for an hour now .
They left the life .The underlined word is a/an
sam ran fast to school yesterday. The underlined word is a/an
While the cat ……, the mice ate the cheese.
questionsData.explain_answer: The structure "while + past continuous" is often used in combination with the past simple tense to express two  actions in the past.

questionsData.title: Yemeni people are famous ….. their generosity .
My favourite team …… right now .
Samantha ….. yesterday. I am sure.
We have only …. sugar.
questionsData.explain_answer:
We have only little sugar.

  • Few is used for countable nouns, but sugar is an uncountable noun (you can't say "one sugar" or "two sugars").
  • Many is used for a large quantity of countable nouns.
  • Much is used for uncountable nouns.
  • Little is used for small quantities of uncountable nouns, which is perfect for this situation where you have a small amount of sugar.

The school will ….. by the committee tomorrow .
The company …… I work is great.
